attributes.action: require the UK's terrestrial television channels to strengthen the rigour and accuracy of their scientific news reporting and factual programmes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The UK's terrestrial television channels should be required to strengthen the rigour and accuracy of their scientific news reporting and factual programmes:

BY employing more journalists, producers and editors with scientific qualifications and 

BY establishing scientific advisory boards consisting of relevant, eminent and professional scientists.



As a first step, all of the UK's terrestrial television companies should be required to establish and to PUBLISH the scientific qualifications of those responsible for reporting, editing and commissioning scientific programming.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
